Chrysler, which remains the weakest of the three, now has enough resources to deal with another recession, Sergio Marchionne said. And the company is launching more fuel-efficient powertrains so that customers won't flee to other brands as gas prices rise, he said. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us.
